title: Are the Crew of the Exploded Challenger Space Shuttle Still Alive?
subtitle: Conspiracy theory claims the seven astronauts supposedly killed in the 1986 Space Shuttle Challenger explosion are quietly living out their lives in the U.S.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The seven astronauts supposedly killed in the 1986 Space Shuttle Challenger explosion are quietly living out their lives in the U.S.
